comment: Physics 2 was genuinely one of the hardest classes I've ever taken and I'm so glad I took it with Dr Hunley. He really puts in the work to make it easier. Go to his office hours, ask questions, meet with him to go over homework and exams. DONT MISS CLASS AND BE ON TIME! He packs a ton of info into each lecture, so pay attention and ask questions.

I meant to write a review in the past, but Dr. Hunley is the best professor. But, just because he is good does not mean you will automatically pass his class. You have to be willing to meet him halfway and put in the effort to do well by studying. He will provide you with the material you need. Physics is hard, but he will help you make it doable.

Seriously one of my favorite professors to date. His lectures are incredibly interesting and it's clear just how passionate he is about physics. I was never a huge fan of physics due to poor teaching in prior classes, but his teaching made me do a complete 180. Do not be afraid to talk to him and ask questions. He's really approachable.

He is an amazing professor. The lectures are very informative and entertaining. There is a take home test to get points back on the original test, which helps your grade a lot. Showing up to lectures is very important because there are no posted notes. Showing up to class and putting in moderate effort is more than enough to pass and do well.

I LOVE THIS PROFESSOR. I feel like if I had anybody else physics would have been a lot more difficult. He's hilarious and his lectures are very straightforward (he doesn't post lectures though, so going to class is critical). There's many opportunities to earn extra points. Breakout sessions are required; he gives graded quizzes (completion grade)

He's the best. Very funny and gives you every opportunity to pass this class. He Gives take-home test so you can get full credit back on what you missed on the test. I had a c in the class before the final and if you tried really hard you could've ended with a B. Take him for physics he's the best at this school.

If you want a funny, informative, and phenomenal professor that will not let you fail if you put in just a bit of effort, take Dr.Hunley. Tests can be made up at home for full credit, and he will help you with any problems if you ask. There is quite simply no better professor on campus, please do yourself a favor and take him. You wont regret it

I took him for Physics 2. He is an amazing professor. He will explain anything until you understand it. He will dedicated as much time as needed almost any time to make sure that you learn. There are take-home tests after every test to make your points back. TAKE HUNLEY!! If you are even slightly struggling, go to his office or email him.

I struggle a lot in Physics, but Dr. Hunley has dedicated so much time, beyond what any professor has ever done for me in the past, to help guide me to not only understand physics but instill tools to direct my focus on conceptual-based questions rather than direct memorization. He is very patient and is easily my most favorite professor to exist.

Dr. Hunley is the best teacher in Kennesaw or even in the US. He explains everything thoroughly and answers all questions. 4 tests including final. You can complete a take home test, doing only questions you missed on the test, for full credit. lowest test is replaced by quiz avg. Quizzes every week in breakout. You basically have a guaranteed C.

Prof Hunley will answer any "less-than-informed" questions you may have. He's pretty thorough with responses and will even venture off into your headspace to respond.

He drops your lowest test and will basically GIVE you an A if you put in the effort to correct your mistakes on your tests and attend breakouts.

Good luck!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: The best professor at KSU, he is one of the nicest professors I have met so far. He is incredibly kind, always eager to help, patient, and genuinely wants t to help you. Attending his classes is beneficial, although attendance is not mandatory. Please be considerate and respectful to him; he is truly a good Professor.

Best Physics professor by far. 3 Tests, hw occasionally, and quizzes every breakout. Don't skip the quizzes bc the questions are very similar to the test questions. Amazing laid back lectures but very theoretical which could throw some people off. Take Hunley if you can I beg of you
Had physics lab, very laid back sometimes a little too much. Hates it when you say "cool beans" to him though it was fun to say that every chance I got.

Amazing professor! There were a few times he missed the bus and could not make it to class but besides that, you could tell he was passionate about Physics. His tests were hard but you have a chance to correct every single test besides the final. Attendance not mandatory but there will be graded quizzes in the breakout session. TAKE HUNLEY!!
